synopsis.text: Kane Blueriver inherited an advanced starship called the Swordbreaker from his grandmother. The ship contains Canal, an intelligent holographic computer program. Together, Kane and Canal work as trouble contractors, taking on dangerous jobs that require their special skills. On one such job, they cross paths with Millie Nocturne, a detective determined to be the best at everything she tries. Though very different, the trio soon becomes an inseparable team. They hurtle through space, facing off against intergalactic criminals, hijackers, and the powerful Nightmare crime syndicate. As they take on job after risky job, they gradually uncover secrets tying the legendary Lost Ships to their own mysterious pasts. Kane hopes learning his grandmother's secrets will help him understand his family legacy and stand against the expanding threat of Nightmare. Alongside Canal and Millie, Kane lives up to his reputation, fearlessly confronting peril as the trio tries to keep Nightmare from ruling the universe.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
